name: Bablen and the Land of Discourtesy
name_original: Bablen and the Land of Discourtesy
description:
Bablen and the Land of Discourtesy is my second game made in RPG Maker. It's about a green boye's adventure. I can't think up a story. Maybe later! After all, it is a beta. More releases soon! :) Yes, one of the songs is the forest theme from Toby Fox's DELTARUNE. 

Discord: https://discord.gg/zcMzK8B
